title: Biostatistics Consultation
text: The Department of Community Medicine, Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin (UniSZA) are offering a free research methodology and statistical consultation service.

title: Biostatistics Consultation
text:
Terms and Conditions
We provide general advice on research methodology and medical/biostatistics. At present, this consultation service is available only to students and faculty members of the Faculty of Medicine, UniSZA.

Each consultation session is limited to a maximum of 45 minutes.
If you require more than two sessions, please consider adding the consultant as a co-researcher.
The selection of a consultant depends on their area of expertise and availability at the time of the request.

To request a consultation, please fill in the Google Form. Our consultant will contact you personally to confirm the appointment date.

title: Biostatistics Consultation
text:
Requirements for Booking a Consultation
To book a consultation session, you must have a brief research proposal that includes:

Title
Objective
Study background
Proposed methods (optional)

title: Biostatistics Consultation
text:
Mode of Consultation
Consultations can be conducted face-to-face or through online meetings. The face-to-face meeting will be held in the Faculty of Medicine, UniSZA unless specified otherwise by the consultant.

title: Biostatistics Consultation
text:
Our Services
We offer guidance in:

Proposal and protocol preparation
Dissertation and thesis preparation
Study design - randomized controlled trials, observational and validation studies
Sample size determination
Research ethics
Statistical analysis and reporting
Manuscript consultation (methodological and statistical content)

title: Biostatistics Consultation
text:
Book an appointment
Please fill in the Google form to book an appointment for a consultation.

title: About
text:
This initiative is a free service provided by the Department of Community Medicine, Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin (UniSZA). Our team consists of experienced lecturers specializing in biostatistics, epidemiology, and public health research. We are dedicated to supporting researchers, postgraduate students, and healthcare professionals in designing studies, analyzing data, and interpreting statistical results.
At present, this consultation service is exclusively available to students and faculty members of the Faculty of Medicine, UniSZA. However, we may expand this service to the public in the future.

title: About
text:
Book an appointment
Please read the Terms and Conditions before booking an appointment. You can fill in the Google form to book the appointment.
